sentences.en: ancient pagan rituals
sentences.cn: 古老的异教仪式

sentences.en: Cocktails at the Plaza was a nightly ritual of their sophisticated world.
sentences.cn: 到广场饭店喝鸡尾酒是他们这个高雅时髦的圈子中的人每晚必做的事情。

sentences.en: I realized that here the conventions required me to make the ritual noises.
sentences.cn: 我意识到此时按照惯例我应该说些客套话。

sentences.en: If your ordinary life is out of control, then retreating into a cosy ritual will not improve matters.
sentences.cn: 如果正常生活都一团糟了，那么再讲究小情调根本无济于事。

sentences.en: Our cricketers are suffering their ritual hammering at the hands of the Aussies.
sentences.cn: 我们的板球队员们照例又狠栽在了澳大利亚队的手上。

sentences.en: ritual dances
sentences.cn: 仪式舞蹈

sentences.en: She objects to the ritual of organized religion.
sentences.cn: 她反对有组织宗教的仪规。

sentences.en: Some of the differences between Protestant denominations have to do with ritual.
sentences.cn: 新教各教派之间的一些差异与宗教仪式有关.

sentences.en: The centuries-old ritual seems headed for extinction.
sentences.cn: 延续了几个世纪的仪式似乎要面临消亡。

sentences.en: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
sentences.cn: 我们生活中宗教和宗教仪式的重要性

sentences.en: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
sentences.cn: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

sentences.en: The New York ritual was precise and inflexible in such matters.
sentences.cn: 在这种事情上纽约的礼仪既一丝不苟又一成不变.

sentences.en: The people believe that the performance of this ritual is the will of the Great Spirit.
sentences.cn: 该部族的人认为举行这种仪式是大神的意志。

sentences.en: The police issued the usual ritual apology.
sentences.cn: 警方发表了例行公事式的道歉。

sentences.en: These ceremonies were already part of pre-Christian ritual in Mexico.
sentences.cn: 这些仪式已经成为墨西哥基督教时期以前的宗教仪式的一部分。

sentences.en: They were there to take part in a ritual act of concord.
sentences.cn: 他们在此参加这个友好的仪式.

sentences.en: They worship dreams Holiness in art, ritual, entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他们崇拜梦,崇拜艺术 、 仪式和娱乐中的神圣.

sentences.en: This sort of ritual circumlocution is common to many parts of mathematics.
sentences.cn: 这种繁冗的遁辞常见于数学的许多部分分式中.

sentences.en: What we see at Westminster is a tired old ritual.
sentences.cn: 我们在威斯敏斯特教堂看到的是一种经年不变的古旧仪式。

sentences.en: When a newspaper dies an almost standard ritual occurs.
sentences.cn: 一家报纸倒闭时,一种几乎例行的仪式必然出现.

trans.tran_en: done in a fixed and expected way, but without real meaning or sincerity

trans.tran_cn: （宗教等的）仪式，例行公事，老规矩，典礼
trans.tran_en: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion
